game.name: Countryside Friends
game.description:
This brand new dressing game can engage you no matter whether you are a girl or a boy. It starts with the two beautiful girls named Skyler and Brenda who have been living at the countryside for many years. They got friends 5 years back and have been enjoying their lives together for 2 years now. Everything, including the flowers and the animals in the countryside attract them a lot. Attending the countryside events is their main hobby. They also want to attend a flower festival today. Help them get ready for the event!

These two pretty girls have shown their trust on you, so join Countryside Friends and gear up to guide them to pick up a fresh pastoral style dress up.  They have already fed up wearing all pink, and now they want a stylish look. Begin this cute html5 girls game by giving them a complete makeover! Style up the first girl and then opt for the second girl! Shape their eyebrows and use all other beauty items including lipstick, blush, eye shadow and mascara! Do not forge to use the contact lenses on her face!

Once their make-up is done, make sure to mix and match as many options as you can to create a perfect outfit for them. Give your first girl a short red skirt with polka dots and a white laced top and combine it with a pair of white loafers and a lovely necklace! Use a pink or any other color bow in her hair. Mix and match multiple outfit and accessory items for her friend! Put your best fashion sense to make them look amazing and stylish! Have a wonderful time without download games on atmegame.com!
